screen:
-= Info about application 'SIPAddHeader' =-
[Synopsis] Add a SIP header to the outbound call
[Description] SIPAddHeader(Header: Content): Adds a header to a SIP call placed with DIAL. Remember to user the X-header if you are adding non-standard SIP headers, like "X-Asterisk-Accountcode:". Use this with care. Adding the wrong headers may jeopardize the SIP dialog. Always returns 0
